content:
path /v3/tatum/usage
operationId getCredits
summary Get information about your credit consumption for the last month
description 1 credit per API call
Get information about your credit consumption for the last month used credits per day
responses
200
schema
Consumption
type object
properties
day
type string
description The date in the MM/DD/YYYY format
usage
type number
description The number of credits used on the specified day
type array
description OK
